content:
Made event name input more robust by capliatlising event names while compensating for acronyms.
Placed limits on the date of events to between 8 years in the past and 7 days in the future. This prevents incorrect user date input when tryping the date of an event.

Added some input strngthening when adding a new cadet so that inputs are automatically trimmed and capitalised.
Enabled compatibility for multi-name forenames and hyphenated names.
Enabled ability to edit cadet details. If a cadet's name is changes, all events under that name have the name field changed so names changes are pushed to all dashboards.
Added a Change Log to decribe and log releases to the user. Versions in the change log used to inform the version number in the bottom right of the app.

Users can now add badges by clicking on empty cells in the PTS Tracker. Currently a bug exists where a badge added on the PTS Tracker, they must refresh the tracker before remvoing the event from the Mass Event Log. The Badge displays correctly in the Mass Event Log, the End of Year Certificate and counts towards Flight Points.
Made changelog show versions in correct order (where v0.10.x shows after v0.9.x).
Fixed bug where the setEvent function (used to add badges via the PTS Tracker) did not properly save events to data context meaning they had could not be deleted without refreshing the page.
